Title: microsoft-open-hack-data-science-devops
Description: OpenHack challenges for integrating DevOps practices with Machine Learning technology

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 2: Refactor Model Training Code
ContentItems.Description: Refactor a training notebook into a script

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 3: Azure Machine Learning Pipelines and Real-Time Inference
ContentItems.Description: Create a Machine Learning pipeline to orchestrate an ML workflow

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 4: Training from a DevOps Pipeline
ContentItems.Description: Create a DevOps pipeline to manage the Machine Learning pipeline creation process

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 5: Observability: Log Metrics and Model Evaluation
ContentItems.Description: Capture metrics during model training and evaluate the trained model before registering

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 6: Observability: Monitoring Deployed Model
ContentItems.Description: Monitor the model and deployed ML model web service for performace issues

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 7: Data Ops for ML: Data Ingestion & Pre-processing
ContentItems.Description: Build a data ingestion pipeline to prepare data for model training

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 8: Data Ops for ML: CI/CD Pipelines as Code
ContentItems.Description: Create CI/CD pipelines to deploy the data ingestion solution across multiple environments

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 9: Advanced: Canary deployment
ContentItems.Description: Deploy the model to a Kubernetes cluster with a Canary deployment strategy
